task.title: Deleting Workflow Reports
task.shortdesc: You can delete a workflow report from the the workflow report column in your (or a project) dashboard.

p.b: Please be careful when deleting Workflow Reports, this action cannot be undone.

step.cmd: From your dashboard (or your project dashboard), click on the X button to the right of the workflow you would like to delete. Click on the Workflow Report to open the editing workflow form. Click on the Delete option to the right of the Workflow report you want to delete.
When you delete a workflow report you are taken to a prompt. Click on Delete report if you would like to proceed or Cancel if you want to go back.
